name: The Woodsman
description:
The Woodsman retells Little Red Riding Hood as a narrative point and click game set in a richly haunted forest world.

Young Red has run away from her family and is blamed for putting a curse on her grandmother. You play as the Woodsman, enlisted by Red to assist her in finding an elder tree fruit to save her grandmother and regain acceptance. The Woodsman, struggling with a shaky identity, journeys with an impossible goal in order to prove their worth. Red and the Woodsman's shared journey unwinds painful histories of isolation, identity, and the struggles of growth.
